# FP&A â€“ Data Usage Boundaries

## Owned Data
The FP&A domain owns:
- Forecast models and outputs
- Budget plans and versions
- Scenario assumptions
- Variance analysis results

## Read-Only Data
- Historical actuals from accounting systems
- Operational metrics from upstream domains
- Reference and master data

## Forbidden Access
The FP&A domain must not:
- Execute financial transactions
- Modify accounting records
- Alter payment or treasury positions
- Override risk or compliance controls
